title: Get me out low priority queue pls!
body: it's put me on low priority queue, but im not AFK, at least im not try to afk, it's just becasue my Wifi somehow turn off. pls i don't want stay in low priority queue and wait 20min for any rank game

replies.body: The only way to get out of a lower priority queue is to play the required games without leaving.  It sounds like your wi-fi is causing you some problems, and if possible I recommend using a wired connection to see if that helps strengthen things up.  If not, our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide may be able to help get you setup with a consistent connection.  I hope that helps!

You Can't buddy, If your internet goes out on you, Riot does view that as YOUR fault for ruining the game for other people, not theirs.  Even if it was bug related, like how I was getting knocked in and out of games during the first week of new client, they don't even pull you out of LPQ.
